title: Amazon KDP Niche Research Method: Find Low Competition, High Profit Niches for Low ACOS
description:
Part 1 of 3 part tutorial - Unlock the exact niche research method I use for Amazon KDP to find low-competition, high-profit niches that keep ACOS low and sales HIGH.
In this step-by-step tutorial, you’ll learn how to analyze keywords, validate market demand, and select profitable niches that actually convert—without wasting money on ads.

⭐ What you’ll learn in this video:

- How to do KDP niche research completely free
- How to find low competition keywords on Amazon
- How niche selection affects Amazon Ads ACOS
- My thought process for making the next book

Link to Creative Fabric:  https://www.creativefabrica.com/ref/6958353/

Subscribe for next lesson: How to make an attractive book cover using Canva.
